units.title: Neural organoid culture with dual SMAD inhibition
units.text: Both culture settings used dual SMAD inhibition for neural induction. After 21 days in culture, we collected MiSTR tissue and neural organoids to perform scRNA-seq, using cell hashing to track the MiSTR segment and organoid condition (Fi
units.rationale: This describes a key procedural step in organoid culture involving dual SMAD inhibition and timing for sample collection.

units.title: Morphogen treatment protocol with concentration gradients
units.text: showing morphogen treatment modalities in this study, representative marker genes (POU5F1, stem cells; TFAP2A, non-neural ectoderm and hindbrain; SOX2, neural stem cells; STMN2, neurons; FOXG1, telencephalon; NKX2-1, ventral telencephalon; VSX2, retina; HOXB2, hindbrain; FOXA2, f... showing different the treatment took place (up is early, down is late). Concentration experiments are represented by progressively taller bars. The shading of the dots and bars in timing and concentration experiments represents the concentration used (darker shading means higher concentration). 'X' indicates untreated (control) organoids.
units.rationale: This excerpt details the morphogen treatment setup, including concentration gradients, timing, and control conditions, forming a core protocol unit.

units.title: Organoid harvesting at day 21 for neuroepithelial analysis
units.text:
We harvested organoids at an early time point (day 21) to capture neuroepithelial populations through patterned progenitors.
Four MiSTR tissues from similar culture conditions (slight variations in SHH and PM concentrations) were stained and showed similar compartmentalization of NKX2-1 expression.
units.rationale: This specifies the critical timing for organoid harvest to target early developmental stages, a key procedural decision.

units.title: Culture conditions for SHH concentration experiments
units.text:
creating developing neural tissue with increasing concentrations of SHH. Bottom, culture protocol for both experimental setups. Images are representative of four organoids from each condition cultured simultaneously.
iB, iPS Brew; SB, SB431542; Nog, Noggin; DIV, days in vitro.
units.rationale: Outlines the experimental setup for SHH concentration gradients, including replication and simultaneous culture, essential for reproducibility.
